documentType: Bureau of Prisons count sheet / inmate roster
summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet and inmate roster from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 10, 2019. It records the official inmate count by housing unit and lists specific inmates on suicide watch or other special assignments, providing a snapshot of the facility's population on that date.

persons.name: Bullock
persons.context: Listed on the inmate roster with registration number 86409-054, assigned to housing unit E05, and noted as being on suicide watch or unassigned.

persons.name: Santana
persons.context: Listed on the inmate roster with registration number 48816-066, assigned to housing unit K09, and noted as being on suicide watch.

persons.name: Walker
persons.context: Listed on the inmate roster with registration number 86900-054, assigned to housing unit E06, and noted as being on suicide watch or unassigned.

persons.name: Woolaston
persons.context: Listed on the inmate roster with registration number 85369-054, assigned to housing unit K11, and noted as being on suicide watch or in the FS warehouse.

events.title: Daily inmate count at MCC New York
events.description: The Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York conducted its official daily inmate count, recording a total of 758 inmates across various housing units.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is dated August 10, 2019, which is the day Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
The total inmate count recorded was 758 individuals across the facility's housing units.
Four specific inmates (Bullock, Santana, Walker, Woolaston) are listed on the roster with notations indicating they were on suicide watch or special assignment.
The document is a routine Bureau of Prisons administrative form used for tracking inmate population and assignments.
The count was cleared at 3:00 AM, as indicated on the count sheet.
